item.title: Italy protests, recalls ambassador to Switzerland after New Year's bar fire suspect released - Reuters
item.description: Italy protests, recalls ambassador to Switzerland after New Year’s bar fire suspect released Reuters’A shocking decision’: Outrage as Crans-Montana bar owner released on bail France 24Italy Recalls Swiss Ambassador as Anger Over Bar Fire Erupts BloombergItaly recalls ambassador in protest after New Year’s Swiss bar fire suspect is released on bail NBC NewsItaly recalls ambassador over Swiss release of Crans-Montana fire suspect politico.eu

item.title: Watch: BBC at protests near scene where Alex Pretti was shot dead
item.description: Protesters chanted Alex Pretti’s name after he became the second person this month to be shot dead by federal agents in Minneapolis.

item.title: Anti-ICE protests take place as T'Wolves-Warriors NBA game takes place
item.description: Anti-ICE messages filled the Target Center on Sunday as the Minnesota Timberwolves took on the Golden State Warriors after another day of unrest.

item.title: Emory fires Iranian official's daughter after campus protests over controversial hiring decision
item.description: Fatemeh Ardeshir-Larijani, daughter of sanctioned Iranian official Ali Larijani, lost her position at Emory University as activists called for review of her immigration status.
